CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 6, 1965, pg. 3 reads: "Buying Courier Subscription - Mrs. Adrena J. Allen (second from left) takes time out to purchase a subscription to The Pittsburgh Courier at The Courier booth at the Brotherhood Food Festival, last Saturday, in Hilton Hotel. Others in the picture are (from left) Mrs. Ethel Posey, long-time stockholder in The Courier; Mrs. Alma A. Polk, subscriptions director of The Courier; Mrs .Cornelia Blair and her daughter, Ramona Blair, and Ollie Pipkins. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ethel Posey and Adrena J. Allen, purchasing subscription, standing at table across from Alma Polk, Cornelia Blair, Ramona Blair, and Ollie Pipkins at Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper booth during Brotherhood Food Festival, Hilton Hotel
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Polk, Alma A.Hilton Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
